original_text: He then brought me to the outer court and led me around to its four corners, and I saw in each corner another court.
korean_text: 나를 데리고 바깥뜰로 나가서 나를 뜰 네 구석을 지나가게 하시는데 본즉 그 뜰 매 구석에 또 뜰이 있는데

sentences.original_text: He then brought me to the outer court
and led me around to its four corners
and I saw in each corner another court
sentences.korean_translation: 각 구석에 또 다른 뜰을 보았습니다
